text: 7:13 Rom 5:20Ezɨ manmakɨn? Bizir aghuir kam ti na gamizɨ kɨ ovenge? Bar puvatɨ. Arazir kuram uabɨ na gamizɨ kɨ ovenge. God kamaghɨn ifonge, arazir kuram azenim girɨghtɨma e bar fogh suam, arazir kuram a bar bizir kuram. Kamaghɨn amizɨ God arazir kuramɨn amamangatɨzɨ, arazir kuram bizir aghuir kamɨn aven otogha na gamizɨ kɨ ovenge. Kamaghɨn amizɨ Moses Osirizir Arazibar tuavimɨn, God guizbangɨra kamaghɨn en aka, arazir kuram bar kurigha mughasi.
